Sentencas: Interconnect development for planar solid oxide fuel cells is considered a vital technical area requiring focused research to meet the performance and cost goals.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A commercial ferritic stainless steel composition for oxidation resistance properties was investigated by measuring the weight gain due to air exposure at fuel cell operating temperature.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A surface treatment process was found to produce a dense, adherent scale and to reduce the oxide scale growth rate significantly.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A process was also identified for coating the surface of the alloy to reduce the in-plane resistance and potentially to inhibit chromium oxide evaporation.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The combination of treatments provided a very low resistance through the scale.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The resistance measured was as low as 10 mOmega-cm(2) at 750 degreesC in air.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The resistance value was stable over several thermal cycles.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The treated samples were exposed to a variety of atmospheres that were relevant in fuel cell operation to evaluate changes in scale morphology.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Analysis of the scale after such exposure showed the presence of a stable composition.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When exposed to a dual atmosphere (air and hydrogen on opposite sides of the metal sheet), however, the scale composition contained a mixture of phases.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additional process modifications are planned to reduce the effect of dual-atmosphere exposure.
Titulo: Evaluation of ferritic stainless steel for use as metal interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells
